message: I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
I appreciate the offer, but $180 is a bit out of my price range. I'm willing to pay $130 for the product. Let me know what you think.
I understand that $180 was a bit steep, but I was thinking more along the lines of $165. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $165 is still a bit high for me.  I'm willing to go up to $140.  Let's see if we can find some common ground.
I'm not quite ready to meet you at $140, but I'm willing to compromise at $155. That's the lowest I can go. Let me know if that works for you.
